## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.getSvgRoot() method

Return the root node of the SVG or null if none exists.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSvgRoot(): SVGElement | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

SVGElement \| null

The root SVG node.
